name: Nippon Fine Chemical Co., Ltd. - Cholesterol
description: Nippon Fine Chemical Co., Ltd. is a Japanese specialty chemical manufacturer offering high-quality cholesterol derived from lanolin alcohol. Their CHOLESTEROL is an odorless white powder produced through extraction and refining processes, featuring superior emulsifying and moisturizing properties essential for barrier repair formulations.
notes: Japanese specialty chemical manufacturer with expertise in lanolin-derived ingredients. CHOLESTEROL is produced through extraction and refining from lanolin alcohol. Superior emulsifying and moisturizing properties make it ideal for barrier repair formulations. Japanese pharmaceutical-grade quality standards.
